availability.description: Defines the level of redundancy in storage to minimize loss of data. Allowed values are low, medium, high. Low could e.g. mean one tape copy only, medium could mean two tape copies and high two geo-redundant tape copies

tapeRetentionTime.description: Number of years after creation time, where datasets are subject to retention policies, possibly leading to deletion of data on tape.

autoArchiveDelay.description: Number of days after dataset creation that (remaining) datasets are archived automatically
